channel.title: meta on The Asura Linux Blog
channel.description: Recent content in meta on The Asura Linux Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello there! Welcome to the Asura Linux Project. This is the first of hopefully many posts in the fresh new Asura Linux blog. It almost smells like fresh paint and a just-mowed lawn here. I recently started Asura Linux as a new Open Source project to explore the possibilities of building modern Linux systems with emerging foundational userspace technologies and conceptsâ€”ultimately guided by user experience. In simpler words, I want to experiment with different ways of building and running Linux systems.
